DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Physical Therapy Program Treat Rotator Cuff Disorders Among Nursing Professionals
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct Rehabilitation Centre Hospital Medical School Ribeirão Preto , University São Paulo ( USP-HCFMRP ) . The study conduct nursing staff ( nurse , technician nurse assistant ) HCFMRP-USP . The sample consist nursing worker send request referral medical diagnosis rotator cuff disorder period May 2010 August 2011 . There sample size calculation study number subject directly depend demand patient refer Department Physical Therapy Rehabilitation Center ( CER ) period data collection . All patient meet study inclusion criterion invite participate . So , meet inclusion criterion sample , subject randomly allocate Group 1 ( control ) 2 ( experimental ) . Group 1 form subject control group perform stretch exercise , cryotherapy strengthen shoulder . Group 2 form subject experimental group perform stretch exercise , strengthen , cryotherapy proprioceção shoulder .
